TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ConfigurationElement extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示配置文件中的配置元素。

span.span: Represents a configuration element within a configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个抽象类，用于表示配置文件中的 XML 元素 (例如 Web.config) 。The is an abstract class that is used to represent an XML element in a configuration file (such as Web.config). 配置文件中的元素可包含零个、一个或多个子元素。An element in a configuration file can contain zero, one, or more child elements. 由于 类定义为抽象类，因此不能创建它的实例。Because the class is defined as abstract, you cannot create an instance of it. 只能从中派生类。You can only derive classes from it. .NET Framework 包括从 类派生以表示标准 XML 配置元素（如）的类 。The .NET Framework includes classes that derive from the class in order to represent standard XML configuration elements, such as . 还可以扩展 类，以访问自定义配置元素和节。You can also extend the class to access custom configuration elements and sections. 本主题后面包含的示例演示如何使用派生自的自定义类访问自定义配置元素和节 。The example included later in this topic shows how to access custom configuration elements and sections by using custom classes that derive from . 你还可以扩展标准配置类型 ，例如、、 和 。You can also extend the standard configuration types such as , , , and . 有关详细信息，请参阅这些类的文档。For more information, see the documentation for those classes. 有关如何访问配置文件中的信息的详细信息，请参阅 类和 类。For more information about how to access information in configuration files, see the class and the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将自定义 同时作为自定义节中的单个元素和自定义节中的元素集合。The following code example shows how to implement a custom both as an individual element in a custom section and as a collection of elements in a custom section. 该示例包含以下文件：The example consists of the following files: - 一个 app.config 文件，其中包含名为的自定义部分 `MyUrls` 。An app.config file that contains a custom section that is named `MyUrls`. 本部分包含一个简单元素， (它不包含任何其他元素) 和元素的集合。This section contains a simple element (it does not contain any other elements) and a collection of elements. 简单元素命名为 `simple` ，集合命名为 `urls` 。The simple element is named `simple` and the collection is named `urls`. - 控制台应用程序。A console application. 应用程序读取 app.config 文件的内容，并将信息写入控制台。The application reads the contents of the app.config file and writes the information to the console. 它使用从、和派生的类 。It uses classes that derive from , , and . - `UrlsSection`从类派生的名为的类 。A class named `UrlsSection` that derives from the class. 此类用于访问 `MyUrls` 配置文件中的部分。This class is used to access the `MyUrls` section in the configuration file. - `UrlsCollection`从类派生的名为的类 。A class named `UrlsCollection` that derives from the class. 此类用于访问 `urls` 配置文件中的集合。This class is used to access the `urls` collection in the configuration file. - `UrlConfigElement`从类派生的名为的类 。A class named `UrlConfigElement` that derives from the class. 此类用于访问 `simple` 配置文件中的元素和集合的成员 `urls` 。This class is used to access the `simple` element and the members of the `urls` collection in the configuration file. 若要运行该示例，请执行以下步骤：To run the example, perform the following steps: 1. 创建一个解决方案，其中包含一个控制台应用程序项目和一个名为的类库项目 `ConfigurationElement` 。Create a solution that has a console application project and a class library project that is named `ConfigurationElement`. 2. 将三个类文件放在类库项目中，并将其他文件放在控制台库项目中。Put the three class files in the class library project and put the other files in the console library project. 3. 在这两个项目中，均设置对的引用 `System.Configuration` 。In both projects set a reference to `System.Configuration`. 4. 在控制台应用程序项目中，将项目引用设置为类库项目。In the console application project set a project reference to the class library project. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#151](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/ConfigurationElement.cs#151)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#151](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/ConfigurationElement.vb#151)] [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#71](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/CustomSection.cs#71)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#71](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/CustomSection.vb#71)] [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#51](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/CustomElementCollection.cs#51)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#51](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/CustomElementCollection.vb#51)] [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/CustomElement.cs#31)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/CustomElement.vb#31)]

para.span: 每个 对象都创建 对象的内部集合，这些对象表示元素特性或子元素的集合。

span.span: Every object creates an internal collection of objects that represents either the element attributes or a collection of child elements.

para.span: 不可自定义的信息和功能由 属性提供的对象所包含 。

span.span: Non-customizable information and functionality is contained by an object provided by the property.

para.span: 您可以使用编程方式或声明性 (特性化) 编码模型来创建自定义配置元素：

span.span: You can use either a programmatic or a declarative (attributed) coding model to create a custom configuration element:

para.span: -编程模型要求每个元素特性都创建一个属性以获取或设置其值，并将其添加到基础基类的内部属性包 。

span.span: - The programmatic model requires that for each element attribute, you create a property to get or set its value and add it to the internal property bag of the underlying base class.

para.span: 有关如何使用此模型的示例，请参阅 类。

span.span: For an example of how to use this model, see the class.

para.span: -更简单的声明性模型（也称为特性化模型）允许您通过使用属性来定义元素特性，然后使用特性修饰它。

span.span: - The simpler declarative model, also called the attributed model, allows you to define an element attribute by using a property and then decorate it with attributes.

para.span: 这些属性指示 ASP.NET 配置系统有关属性类型及其默认值的信息。

span.span: These attributes instruct the ASP.NET configuration system about the property types and their default values.

para.span: 通过反射获取此信息，ASP.NET 配置系统会为您创建元素属性对象并执行所需的初始化。

span.span: With this information, obtained through reflection, the ASP.NET configuration system creates the element property objects for you and performs the required initialization.

para.span: 本主题后面显示的示例演示如何使用此模型。

span.span: The example shown later in this topic shows how to use this model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用属性，可以轻松确定要作为 .NET Framework 的哪个版本。The property makes it easy to determine which version of the .NET Framework is targeted. 顶级实例的属性 指示目标框架版本。The property of the top-level instance indicates the targeted framework version.

related.span: 面向 Web 项目的 .NET Framework

span.span: .NET Framework Targeting for Web Projects

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象为对象提供必要的上下文， 使其根据其计算位置做出决定。A object provides the context necessary for a object to make decisions based upon where it is being evaluated. 对象提供与配置的元素相关的环境详细信息。The object provides environment details related to an element of the configuration. 例如，你可以使用 属性来确定是否 已在 Machine.config 中设置，或者可以 使用属性确定元素所属的层次结构 。For example, you can use the property to determine whether a was set in Machine.config, or you can determine which hierarchy a element belongs to by using the property.

exception.span: 当前元素未关联上下文。

span.span: The current element is not associated with a context.

summary.span: 指示自上次保存或加载该配置元素后并在派生类中实现该元素时，该元素是否已被修改。

span.span: Indicates whether this configuration element has been modified since it was last saved or loaded, when implemented in a derived class.

returns.span: 如果该元素已被修改，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the element has been modified; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法确定 当调用方法时此对象是否将写入到配置文件中 。The method determines whether this object will be written to the configuration file when the method is called. 如果返回的值为 `false`，则表明配置文件表示该元素的当前状态。If the return value is `false`, it is assumed that the configuration file represents the current state of the element. 默认情况下 ， `true` 通过索引器为此对象设置属性后返回 。By default, returns `true` after a property is set through the indexer to this object. 重写 方法以提供此元素状态的自定义指示 。Override the method to provide custom indication of the state of this element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何扩展 。The following example shows how to extend . [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#35](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/CustomElement.cs#35)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/CustomElement.vb#35)] 当修改配置元素时，将调用上一个示例中所示的方法，如以下示例中所示。The method shown in the previous example is called when a configuration element is modified, as in the following example. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/ConfigurationElement.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/ConfigurationElement.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您同时锁定所有属性，但您指定的属性除外。The property allows you to lock all the attributes at once, with the exception of the one you specify. 为此，请使用 方法，如 "示例" 一节中所述。To do that, you use the method, as explained in the Example section. > [!NOTE] > 属性允许您防止修改应用规则的元素的子配置元素。The property allows you to prevent the child configuration elements of the element to which you apply the rule from being modified. 如果要对父元素及其子元素施加常规锁定，请使用属性。Use the property if you want to put a general lock on the parent element itself and its child elements. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 。The following example shows how to use the . [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/ConfigurationElement.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/ConfigurationElement.vb#9)]

para.span: 如果 同时使用和 属性，则将应用限制性最强的规则。

span.span: If you use the and properties at the same time, the most restrictive rule applies.
